articles.author: Sam Sutton
articles.title: Trump's 'Golden Age' has arrived for the top 10 percent - Politico
articles.description: The robust GDP numbers reported this week mask the extent to which wealthy Americans are driving growth.
articles.content: But the robust numbers mask the extent to which the wealthy are driving growth. And while business leaders from Manhattan to South Florida are bullish on the outlook Its the Roaring 20s here in Palm … [+5423 chars]
